House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00011
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MODIFYING THE COMPENSATION AND POSITION CLASSIFICATION SYSTEM OF CIVILIAN GOVERNMENT PERSONNEL AND THE BASE PAY SCHEDULE OF MILITARY AND UNIFORMED PERSONNEL IN THE GOVERNMENT, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Salary Standardization Law Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Raises the base pay of the government personnel to be competitive with the market rates, strengthen the link between pay and performance through an enhanced performance-based bonus system, temper the cost of benefit while maximizing the benefits of the employees, and allow higher take-home pay, particularly for government personnel belonging to the lower salary grades.
